channel.title: Roofing on The Miette
channel.description: Recent content in Roofing on The Miette

item.title: Operation Find a Roof
item.description: Operation Find a Roof As Lys sits down to write this she can officially say that we have sourced all of our roof components! It is a mixture of second hand material and some first-hand non-negotiable(s) but it’s great to finally have all the bits and bobs. Table Of Contents The Design The Material Gutters Sundry Items The Design We chose to have a slightly off centred gable roof for our tiny house.
